Item1.Name: Dr Professor
Item1.Description: You are the renowned Dr. Professor!

Item2.Name: Outside
Item2.Description: The dence forest goes on forever in every direction. The remenants of a structure stands before you.

Items.Name: Rusty Key
Items.Description: A key covered in rust. Hopefully it still works.

north.Name: Rusty Door
north.Description: An old rusty door that have seen better days. Despite the rust it looks to sturdy to break down.

Item2.Name: Entrance
Item2.Description: A Small antechamber for the tomb. The air is stale, you might be the first person to breathe it in thousands of years.

Items.Name: Stone Pillar
Items.Description: The Stone pillar is covered in faded inscriptions in a language you don't know.

Item2.Name: Great Hall
Item2.Description: A grand hall. The walls are covered with more mysterious writings. In the center of the hall stands an Ancient Altar.

Items.Name: Ancient Altar
Items.Description: The altar is dotted with more of the strange writing. There are also pictographs that seams to show the ancient king rising from his grave.

Items.Name: Broken Key
Items.Description: The key is ancient and broken. You doubt any modern tools could fix it.
Items.UseText: You successfuly repaired the Broken Key. You now find yourself holding the Ancient Key

west.Name: Ancient Door
west.Description: A great stone door blocking your way into the heart of the tomb.

Item2.Name: Ancient Tomb
Item2.Description: The heart of the ancient tomb. Before you lies countless treasures. In the center of the room rests the ancient king in his coffin.
